dcterms:creator: Pravin Varaiya
dcterms:description: The Caltrans Performance Measurement System (PeMS) collects traffic flow, speed, and other traffic condition information using loop detectors placed on freeways, and overlays this data with incident reports. The dataset is used to analyze causal relationships between traffic conditions and the occurrence of rare events such as vehicular accidents.
dcterms:title: Caltrans Performance Measurement System (PeMS)
